---
title: "2020-05: Binary Boarding"
---

::: {.cell hash='2020-05_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-1_0783abea3dd8684e45d1371f6a025ba8'}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(stringr)
library(DescTools)

df <- read.csv("input.csv")
```
:::


## Part 1


::: {.cell hash='2020-05_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-2_11b5d2d97da4ce910200df0d9ab13544'}

```{.r .cell-code}
df$rowbin <- df$X1
df$rowbin <- str_replace_all(df$rowbin, "F", "0")
df$rowbin <- str_replace_all(df$rowbin, "B", "1")
df$rownum <- BinToDec(df$rowbin)

df$colbin <- df$X2
df$colbin <- str_replace_all(df$colbin, "L", "0")
df$colbin <- str_replace_all(df$colbin, "R", "1")
df$colnum <- BinToDec(df$colbin)
```
:::

::: {.cell hash='2020-05_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-3_cbc81b8b768bea70d7a5dfcce51335da'}

```{.r .cell-code}
df$seatid <- (df$rownum * 8) + df$colnum
max(df$seatid)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
[1] 828
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
write.csv(df, "input2.csv")
```
:::


## Part 2


::: {.cell hash='2020-05_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-4_85806495bc9270af2b966ab787ffac0f'}

```{.r .cell-code}
df <- df[order(df$seatid),]
```
:::

::: {.cell hash='2020-05_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-5_7010603a3bb55a6eb918b433427a490d'}

```{.r .cell-code}
for(i in 804:1) {
  if(df$seatid[i + 1] - df$seatid[i] != 1) {
    myseat <- df$seatid[i + 1] - 1
    break
  }
}

myseat
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
[1] 565
```
:::
:::
